statements: DELETE FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 2 AND duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
DELETE FROM footage_storage WHERE footage_id = 2001 AND camera_id = 1002;
DELETE FROM camera_location WHERE floor_level < 3 AND latitude > 40;
DELETE FROM footage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-10 23:59:59';
DELETE FROM cameras WHERE model = 'Canon 1DX Mark II';
DELETE FROM footage WHERE camera_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
